data.title: Very good
data.text: A very good quaint restaurant.The italian nachos are a real treat. The menu is Italian and everything we have tried is excellent.Stop in for a real treat.

data.title: Business Lunch
data.text: Parking not always convenient, but walking is a good thing.. Service was friendly and food was very good, lots of options and they have a lunch special too. As a business traveler I always look for local places instead of chains and this is a good choice for locals.

data.title: Great Buffet
data.text: Vittone's has recently started offering a lunch and dinner buffet. It is amazing! They have different styles of pizza, pasta, salad bar and you must grab a cinnamon roll for dessert! The staff is always friendly and welcoming. Don't forget to ask about drink specials too.

data.title: Very Good
data.text: We were in town and have been wanting to check this place out, they are closed on Sunday. Well it was worth it had the Benzina Stromboli outstanding and only $8. The boss had the Classico Calzone huge and good just not as good as my stromboli but hers was only $7 we will be back.

data.title: Fabulous Service, Delightful al fresco dining!
data.text: My husband and I and our friends had a delicious dinner on the sidewalk. My Classico calzone was fresh, hot and delicious!   The other dinners were good also. The chicken al fredo I tasted was just as good. Our server, Kristy, was so much fun and made great recommendations. We even returned for dessert after attending our scheduled event at The Princess Theatre across the street. What a fun evening!  We will be returning to Vittone's and asking for Kristy!

data.title: Not what we expected
data.text:
We have been wanting to eat here for a while and the addition of a deep dish pizza to the menu made the choice easy.
When we first walked in there was only a few people dining. The first thing I noticed was the smell.. You would expect to smell the aroma of sauces, pizza, etc but instead it was just the smell of an old historic building. That should have been our first clue.
Our server was very nice..
The food was very slow in coming out to the table despite us being the only ones dining at this point.
Our pizza was a small deep dish with only 4 slices. The cheese wasn't melted all the way. Our friends had a pasta dish and a small pizza (the crust was just a flatbread) which they said was fair.
Before we left there was a good sized amount of people at the bar area which leads me to believe maybe the food is secondary to the drinks.. You may like it, for us we probably won't go back..
Just my opinion

data.title: Great  place to  eat!
data.text: Everything we ordered was  great! Loved the pizza and desserts! The staff is  friendly and very helpful.

data.title: Excellent dinner & Service
data.text: We had a restraurant.com coupon and decided to try out Vittones in Decatur for dinner. We eat out quite a lot and often come away with a mediocre review. Vittone’s was a lovely exception. We started-off with a meatball appetizer and a bottle of chianti. We shared a house salad and decided to order a variety of small pizzas because they all sounded really good. We sampled the Mediterranean, Benzina and Fire Roasted Vegetable. All were incredible but the Benzini was my favorite. What made the experience even better was the exceptional service provided by Jay Sweaza. Very likable and personable with just the right amount of attention to service. Thanks, Jay~!

data.title: Fantastic Pizza
data.text: This was our first visit to Vittone's. The pizza was fantastic loaded with great flavor and generous toppings! The customer focus was top notch. Our server Jay was outstanding! We will try this place again! l

data.title: Best Pizza in 100 miles, Best Bar and bartenders in town small comfortable fun
data.text: Great Pizza, but I usually go after work to meet my girlfriends and have some wine and finger food. I like it because the bar is separate from the dinning room. So we can move from Having a nice dinner to the bar and continue at a little louder pace without disturbing anyone. Oh yea the best bartenders around, great drinks.

data.title: Good wine, good food
data.text: Actually, the wine makes the food better.  I loved it the first time I went, liked it a little less the next time.  The third time it seemed the food was micro waved.  The last time I was there, my order was messed up, we were forgotten, it wasn't very good at all.

data.title: Good local Italian place
data.text: I've been to Vittone's a number of times for lunch over the past two years.  They've been good every time.  They offer a variety of pizzas, stombolis and the like.  The service is friendly, too.

data.title: Terrific, from scratch, Italian in a Barbeque town
data.text: It's a little bar and a little restaurant. It's not chain pizza and that's a good thing. The pasta dishes are good but I come back for the Mediteranian and Fire Roasted Veggie pizzas. The side dining room is better for families and conversation but both rooms are comfortable. Service is friendly and efficient. The beer is cold. And it's just a great little local pizza place. I try to drop in every time I'm in town.

data.title: Everything hits the mark!
data.text: I've been here every time I'm in town.  I've had something different every time I've gone and I'm never disappointed.  I've had pizza - delicious, cheesy and hot; Pasta perfectly cooked and Calzone, also cheesy and delicious with desired filling.  They also have a full bar and multiple dessert selections.  All servers were friendly and attentive.  The attire is casual and the location is great.  Will probably return again when I go back to Decatur.

data.title: OK
data.text: Have eaten there twice and just don't care for it. I don't feel its a good value for what you get. Francesco's is the best Italian food in Decatur.

data.title: Quality is going away
data.text: Have been a regular customer for three years and have always enjoyed the food. The last two visits however have been very disappointing. The pizza has been tasteless and the crusts have been like cardboard. Today I went to see if the last visit was a blip but today's was worse and it took forty minutes to get it. Will give this spot a rest for a while and I have been a weekly customer

data.title: Goods food and good prices
data.text: We have had 4 or 5 meals and have been pleased every time. The spag. is good bread good and salads good. The other food is good and pizza very good. Prices are not bad either.

data.title: Hometown Italian
data.text: We love their pasta. The staff could not be more friendly. Even if it is your 1st visit they treat you like family.

data.title: Great pizza and pasta dishes
data.text: The pizza hers is amazing!!!!! We went out with our family and some friends on Saturday night and there was 4 adults and 4 kids and their booths are big enough to hold all of us lol. Very friendly staff and casual family dinner atmosphere with a great bar. Plenty of tv's and they also have trivia. Just try this pizza and compare it with mellow mushroom across the street and there won't even be a comparison in my opinion. We got a large cheese pizza, large buffalo chicken pizza and a chicken Alfredo pasta. It was 49 dollars and some change which is right around what we spend when we go out for a family of 4. So the prices aren't too high. The calzones are very good here, but the pizza is just too good for me to pass up. I'm normally not a think pizza kinda guy. I'm more of a deep dish guy but this pizza is definitely worth the exception.

data.title: Great food at a great price.
data.text: Vittone's is one of my go too lunch destinations. My regular order is the Roma Calzone, which is excellent. The chicken parmigiana is enjoyable as well. My kids love the pizza. Everything is reasonably priced, and the service is polite and efficient. I also like that it is a true locally owned business.
